rows.label: qst700805_msg0001
rows.name:
If I've been found, I
won't struggle, mo.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0002
rows.name: Boil me, bake me, do as you please, mo.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0101
rows.name: We won't, we won't do that...

rows.label: qst700805_msg0102
rows.name:
All we need is for you to apologize
to the old woman, that's it, okay?

rows.label: qst700805_msg0201
rows.name: So you are prepared... is that it?

rows.label: qst700805_msg0202
rows.name:
I understand! I will guarantee
your safety after you apologize!

rows.label: qst700805_msg0302
rows.name:
But please, show it not to
us, but to that old woman.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0401
rows.name:
You're quick to the point.
Then, I'll have you go
apologize to Oulu-san at once.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0502
rows.name:
Now, please go to the old woman's
place and apologize properly.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0601
rows.name: Hmm, for a Nopon, you've got some guts.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0602
rows.name:
If you have that kind of
grace, then hurry up and
apologize to that old granny.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0701
rows.name: We didn't come here to capture you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0702
rows.name:
We just want you to listen to
that old woman's words again.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0801
rows.name:
Are you sure? If I get serious,
not even your ashes will remain.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0802
rows.name:
I'm joking. Hurry and go
to that lady's place.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0901
rows.name:
Hmm, we are not the military or
police, so we won't restrain you.

rows.label: qst700805_msg0902
rows.name:
But shouldn't you do the
right thing by that lady?
